sideCard.title: Book support

sections.html:
When you’re stressed, your brain stays in alert mode. That makes it harder to shift into rest. A calmer night routine helps: reduce screen brightness 45 minutes before bed, write down your worries as a list, plan a single next step for tomorrow, do a 2-minute breathing cycle, and keep your bedroom cool and quiet. Consistency matters more than perfection.

Note: This content is educational and not a diagnosis.
